title: Harvest at Nong Lub
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indonesia - Rural conditions

description: Episode of Series "Thailand". Without intruding, an Australian camera crew lives with a Thai family during the rice harvest. The comings and goings, the hard work, the moments of relaxation, the dreams and also the aspirations are briefly held in the hope of understanding the differences in life and the similarities in being
